casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Travis Rashad MITCHELL 4P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 8, 2018 Ben G. Irons, II, Attorney at Law, Greenville, for Mitchell, Travis. Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of January 2018 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of January 2018."
